backend/main.mo: Main actor defining types and state for reviews, articles, bikes, comments, ratings, and admin‑protected operations, including storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old review data to the new structure by adding pros, cons, rating, and defaulting missing contentType to news.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to implemented requirements for contentType handling, conditional review fields, and pros/cons/rating persistence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend components, pages, and UI elements.
frontend/.deploy-retry-trigger: Metadata file indicating a deployment retry was triggered due to a prior platform error.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation outlining steps for retrying failed deployments and post‑success validation procedures.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global color variables and theme styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes with TanStack Router and wrapping the UI in theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with about text, category links, region list, social icons, and a dynamic copyright.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Implements the main header with navigation, search, region selector, mobile menu, and auth controls.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps the app with region context and renders the header, footer, main outlet, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/BikeCard.tsx: Displays a bike preview card with image, region badge, specs, price range, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/components/BikeForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing bikes with fields for specs, images, colors, pricing, and validation logic.
frontend/src/components/BikeImageGallery: Image gallery with navigation arrows, thumbnails, error fallback, and optional expand callback.
frontend/src/components/BikeSelector.tsx: Popover-based searchable selector allowing users to pick a bike from a list.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Renders a grid of category cards linking to category or comparison pages, each with icon and description.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: Displays comments for a review with posting, deletion, hiding, and moderation capabilities.
Shows side‑by‑side bike specifications and review-based score comparisons in a table layout.
frontend/src/components/ImageLightbox.ts: Provides a modal image viewer with navigation, keyboard controls, and error fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/LatestLaunchesCa: Displays recent launch articles in a carousel with title, region badge, excerpt, and link.
Parses long-form text into headings and paragraphs and renders it with styled prose.
frontend/src/components/MobileToc.tsx: Renders a collapsible mobile table of contents highlighting and navigating to headings.
frontend/src/components/ModerationMenu.t: Provides dropdown actions for hiding or deleting comments with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/PaletteSwatchEdi: Dialog for editing a hex color swatch with validation and preview before saving.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Forces new authenticated users to enter name and optional bio before continuing.
frontend/src/components/RatingWidget.tsx: Displays average user rating for a review and allows authenticated users to submit ratings.
frontend/src/components/RegionFilter.tsx: Provides tab-based region selection and notifies parent on changes.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuthActio: Wraps children and prompts unauthenticated users to sign in before performing an action.
frontend/src/components/ScoreBreakdown.t: Shows detailed category scores and overall score using progress bars.
Renders a clickable nested table of contents highlighting the active heading.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button to toggle between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns authentication state, user profile, and admin role info based on current identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity management through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating articles, reviews, bikes, and related content via an actor API, including publishing, deleting, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegionContext.tsx: Implements a React context for storing and updating the selected region with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useTableOfContents.ts: Extracts headings from content, tracks the active heading via IntersectionObserver, and exposes a scroll-to-heading helper.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark CSS variable themes, global styles, and smooth scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single article with metadata, content, and a responsive table of contents, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/BikeDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed bike info including images, pricing, and color options with lightbox support, and handles invalid or missing IDs.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Lists all bikes for a specific brand with logo display, loading states, and fallbacks when no bikes are found.
frontend/src/pages/BrandsPage.tsx: Builds a searchable list of motorcycle brands by aggregating bikes, extracting logos, and rendering brand cards with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/BuyingGuideDetailPage: Loads and displays a specific buying guide with metadata, long‑form content, and a table of contents with desktop and mobile variants.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Displays articles or reviews for a given category with region filtering, loading states, and per‑item badges and scores.
frontend/src/pages/ComparePage.tsx: Lets users select two bikes and optionally shows a comparison table using bike and review data.
frontend/src/pages/CreateArticlePage.tsx: Provides a form for creating or saving articles with category, region, and content‑type selection and navigation after submission.
frontend/src/pages/CreateReviewPage.tsx: Provides a review‑creation form including bike selection, region, ratings, pros/cons parsing, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page fetching reviews, bikes, and articles to display trending reviews, latest launches, and category navigation sections.
frontend/src/pages/ManageBikesPage.tsx: Admin/user interface for creating, editing, deleting, and seeding bike listings with authentication and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/MyDraftsPage.tsx: Shows authenticated users their draft articles and reviews with options to publish or create new content.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed motorcycle review with bike info, TOC navigation, scores, content, and comments.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Search page that scans articles, reviews, and bikes, grouping matches and highlighting matching brands.
frontend/src/pages/SectionPalettesPage.t: React page for creating text-based sections and generating, editing, and managing color palettes extracted from the text.
frontend/src/utils/markdownSpecs.ts: Parses Markdown spec tables to extract specs text plus optional price ranges and color lists.
frontend/src/utils/reviewFields.ts: Utility helpers for converting pros/cons and ratings between textarea strings and structured values.
frontend/src/utils/sectionPalette.ts: Detects color names and hex codes in text and generates deduplicated palettes with light/dark variants.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, containers, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project schema, feature requirements, and pending requests for adding per-document content types and review fields. Includes architectural notes, known issues, and lists of implemented and pending features.
